title: La incógnita de El Carmen de Bolívar : vacuna VPH
author: Parra Florez; Laura Catherine
description: This multimedia report reconstructs and investigates what has happened at a social, scientific and political level with the almost 800 adolescents from El Carmen de Bolívar who presented health problems in 2014, which for the community and for some sectors was caused by the vaccine against the human papilloma virus (HPV). The project is close to the stories of seven adolescents who are ill and associate it with the vaccine, inquires about the medical attention they have received, the Government's responses to the problem, exposes the debate on vaccine safety at the national level and presents the international panorama.

Abstract This multimedia report reconstructs and investigates what has happened at a social, scientific and political level with the almost 800 adolescents from El Carmen de Bolívar who presented health problems in 2014, which for the community and for some sectors was caused by the vaccine against the human papilloma virus (HPV). The project is close to the stories of seven adolescents who are ill and associate it with the vaccine, inquires about the medical attention they have received, the Government's responses to the problem, exposes the debate on vaccine safety at the national level and presents the international panorama.
